title: Action Music Pack - Action Loops 1&2
description: Over 35 Original Action Music Loops of Varying Intensities!
longDescription:
Experience the perfect musical accompaniment for your next action/adventure project. The Action Loops 1&2 pack features 11 original tracks broken down into 35 loops of varying intensities to account for any scenario in your next action project!


Demo available below!


https://soundcloud.com/user-143734308/action-loops-12-demo?si=0acd98c297b44bf6b636d42d1511db57&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing



Interested in original music for your next project?

Feel free to contact me through https://joshuabrazil.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  1. At Your Six - Intensity levels 1-3
  2. Look Out Below - Intensity Levels 1-3
  3. Race Through the City - Intensity Levels 1-4
  4. In the Jungle - Intensity Levels 1-3
  5. 2085 - Intensity Levels 1-4
  6. Time Chase - Intensity Levels 1-4
  7. On the Rooftops - Intensity Levels 1-4
  8. Brace For Impact - Intensity Levels 1-3
  9. Action Loop 1 - Intensity Levels 1-3
  10. Action Loop 2 - Intensity Levels 1-3
  11. Sci Fi Action - Intensity levels 1-4


Number of Audio Wavs: 38

Number of Audio Cues: 38

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 20:50

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


https://joshuabrazil.com
